properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01, DNC 07.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS BY M/V POLARCUS ALIMA
   TOWING 12 8100 METER LONG CABLES ALONG
   TRACKLINES BETWEEN:
   A. 29 JAN
      35-29.17S 051-04.02W AND 35-16.88S 051-22.98W.
   B. 29 AND 30 JAN
      35-07.93S 051-23.37W AND 35-23.82S 050-58.85W.
   C. 30 JAN
      35-28.92S 051-03.77W AND 35-16.63S 051-22.73W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 301/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 31 JAN 17.
